ht32f5xxxx_gptm.c
Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 The SCTM, PWM, GPTM, and MCTM timer have similar architecture. They use the same driver,
00002 "ht32fxxxxx_tm.c/.h" to save the code size. For those timers, please refet to the TM driver/example.

For complete information of HT32 Series 32-bit Microcontrollers platform visit Holtek Website
